title: mute all. thx rito
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
sarkazum2: fuck auto fill
sarkazum2: im better jg than adc,
sarkazum2: get my lane twice, then got through a line of dodges
sarkazum2: im a mid/support main
sarkazum2: i had those selected, lol
sarkazum2: its hard to climb as support
sarkazum2: i made it to s5 as support, but then kept gettin shit adc/s or someone afks or someone elsse feeds
In-Game
sarkazum2: why are you guys gold and plat or w/e in this match
sarkazum2: morg, and ren was plat
sarkazum2: was*
sarkazum2: you get the frames from last season
sarkazum2: oo
sarkazum2: transfer?
sarkazum2: ty
sarkazum2: dont blame me
sarkazum2: you fucked up
sarkazum2: i was keeping her away from you, and you over stayed in a lane with a champ that can jump to u
sarkazum2: this morg needs to go bak
sarkazum2: back*
sarkazum2: morg, im jg, and i have just as much cs as u
sarkazum2: ur shit
sarkazum2: bought account is starting to sshow
sarkazum2: yep, my fault u suck
sarkazum2: except your the only lane losing
sarkazum2: morg is the one starting shit, im just putting her in her place, she will be down to b5 soon, but not this match
sarkazum2: this morg
sarkazum2: is all my fault
sarkazum2: you guys give up to e
sarkazum2: ez
sarkazum2: ur dumb, muted
sarkazum2: im glad i learned to use mute, lol
sarkazum2: try and troll me more trash
sarkazum2: tryin to take my blue
sarkazum2: u dont need em
sarkazum2: you will get no buff
sarkazum2: lulu and ren can have em, but not u
sarkazum2: or morg
sarkazum2: yeap, im bad
sarkazum2: auto filled jg, and doing better than u
sarkazum2: lol
sarkazum2: we need to group around ren, he says
sarkazum2: yeah, i agree, but she was bot lane alone
sarkazum2: s4
sarkazum2: actually
sarkazum2: on a hot streak too, willing to let that go
sarkazum2: group around ren she says
sarkazum2: ur dumb
sarkazum2: i taunted yi, pos
sarkazum2: nope, yall wanna be %%%%s, i can be one too
sarkazum2: no, morg and jinx been on my ass all game, i responded
sarkazum2: you have more deaths, and less kill participation than i do
sarkazum2: so ur feeding
sarkazum2: i know, kda is hard to understand
sarkazum2: lol
sarkazum2: you must be falling in rank
sarkazum2: u were the one bot lane bud
sarkazum2: trash
sarkazum2: why the fuck do i wanna do shit to help you 2, ur toxic and assholes,
sarkazum2: ive prob done more dmg than both of u
sarkazum2: ive tried
sarkazum2: you guys dont help
sarkazum2: so i dont bother
sarkazum2: stfu
sarkazum2: i aint taunting neither one of em
Post-Game
sarkazum2: lmao
sarkazum2: i out dmged the adc
sarkazum2: and its my fault
sarkazum2: all game morg and jinx allll game, pointing fingers at me
sarkazum2: nice throw
sarkazum2: have a nice fall to bronze
sarkazum2: u mean jinx
sarkazum2: and mor
sarkazum2: how do i have as much cs, and do more dmg than them
sarkazum2: maybe if you wouldnt have been a dick
sarkazum2: its crazy, but ppl tend to help others when they are not being disrespected
sarkazum2: had nothin to do with blue
sarkazum2: i had u muted b4 that bud
sarkazum2: i just like to help bronzies get to were they belong


first 5mins of this game, morgana calling gg and blaming me for her stupidity. The complaining bout everyone not grouping, yet she is always over extended bot lane shoving, and complaining bout grouping at the same damn time. these chat logs are bullshit, since they only show my  words, and not what they were saying. Rito wants to say well we dont condone this type of behavior, but you guys put in emotes for the specific reason to "flex" aka bm. yes i swore a little, i wouldnt say it was excessive. and i obviously didnt feed or int, since i had 2nd most kill particaption, and died less. so why am i in trouble.

replies.body:
You're in trouble because you continually flamed people.

Them "starting it" does not give you the excuse to treat them like shit.

but they can continue to treat me like shit? im supposed to sit there  and let them do it. and try to continue to play nice to win the match. when they being toxic. like i said the chat logs dont show what they say, so you can not say im treating them like shit.

>but they can continue to treat me like shit? 

You said it. Not Chermo. He didn't even imply it.

>like i said the chat logs dont show what they say, so you can not say im treating them like shit.

It shows what YOU said. You treated them like shit.
no, i responded to what they said....as in they said something, i replied. it doesnt show what they said. these chat logs are bs.

>no, i responded to what they said

By treating them like shit. Tell me, what does responding to flamers do?
see, i stopped responding to you, and nothing changed....

No, this isn't about their behavior, it's about yours. You are never punished for what others do in League. Others behavior does not factor into your punishment at all.

You treating them like shit is independent of what they do. Even if they also treated you like shit, it doesn't mean that you *didn't* treat them like shit. In that case, both of you deserve punishment.

I strongly suggest you mute people instead of retaliating against them as you did here. There is no reason to leave toxic players unmuted.
hence the title, mute all. its how i will join every game, followed by all emotes since i guess thats how the game is supposed to be played now.

Or, you could instead just mute players who are being toxic, and have the self control to not retaliate against them?

It's pretty hard to play as a team if you willingly eliminate all communication from the game.

I think you'll find yourself woefully unable to communicate with just pings. They can do much of the *short term* communication (i.e. "i'm here now" or "i'll be there in 30 seconds" or "danger now" or "enemy missing now") but you can't discuss long term strategy with pings.

Plus, self control is a better solution than a bandaid anyday.
and you believe there is any type of communication going with everyone blaming others, pointing the finger at others, being disrespectful to others. no there isnt,

Funny enough, I've only seen one player I can remember in the past 2 weeks who was blaming, pointing the finger, or being disrespectful.

Most of the time, if you're nice to others, they're also nice to you.
no, they are not, most players are emote spamming assholes. and we have to deal  with them or get chat restricted.

There isn't a whole lot of nice, understanding players left. Most of them have chat muted or disabled because of the overwhelming amount of toxicity. Even in Draft  (recently got perma banned for calling someone childish) people spam you with pings and trash talk. Even before you type a message. Muting chat is seriously the only way to play games without getting some flamer spamming you with enemies missing ping anytime you move

> [{quoted}](name=sarkazum2,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mxa1Vhuv,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-29T04:03:39.879+0000)
>
> but they can continue to treat me like shit? im supposed to sit there  and let them do it. and try to continue to play nice to win the match. when they being toxic. like i said the chat logs dont show what they say, so you can not say im treating them like shit.

Why you got to be so weak willed to be hurt by some words over a video game?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

ignore them and move on with your life lmao

You're in trouble because you used toxicity to fight toxicity.
You were no better than that Morg you mentioned. Just because someone started something doesn't mean you get to be an asshole too.

I called em asshats once, maybe %%%%s, and I called jinx a pos..so 2 times I was directly toxic I guess. other than that, the rest of my response's were defensive responses and I don't see how they are toxic..

it was %%%%s..
